Item.Name: Y
Item.LongDesc: n x v data matrix; n observations and v variables. Rows of Y represent observations, and columns represent variables. Missing values (NaN's) and infinite values (Inf's) are allowed, since observations (rows) with missing or infinite values will automatically be excluded from the computations.

Item.Name: bsb
Item.LongDesc: List of units forming the initial subset. If bsb=0 (default) then the procedure starts with p units randomly chosen else if bsb is not 0 the search will start with m0=length(bsb)

Item.Name: init
Item.ShortDesc: Point where to start monitoring required diagnostics
Item.LongDesc: Note that if bsb is supplied, init>=length(bsb). If init is not specified it will be set equal to floor(n*0.6).

Item.Name: plots
Item.ShortDesc: It specify whether it is necessary to produce the plots of minimum Mahalanobis distance
Item.LongDesc: If plots=1, a plot of the monitoring of minMD among the units not belonging to the subset is produced on the screen with 1% 50% and 99% confidence bands else (default) no plot is produced.

Item.Name: msg
Item.ShortDesc: It controls whether to display or not messages about great interchange on the screen
Item.LongDesc: If msg==1 (default) messages are displyed on the screen else no message is displayed on the screen.

Item.Name: nocheck
Item.ShortDesc: It controls wether to perform checks on matrix Y
Item.LongDesc: If nocheck is equal to 1 no check is performed on matrix Y. As default nocheck=0.

Item.Name: bsbsteps
Item.LongDesc: It specifies for which steps of the fwd search it is necessary to save the units forming subsets. If bsbsteps is 0 we store the units forming subset in all steps. The default is store the units forming subset in all steps if n<=5000, else to store the units forming subset at steps init and steps which are multiple of 100. For example, as default, if n=7530 and init=6, units forming subset are stored for m=init, 100, 200, ..., 7500.
Item.Example: 'bsbsteps',[100 200] stores the unis forming subset in steps 100 and 200.

Item.Name: mmd
Item.TypeInd: Monitoring of minimum Mahalanobis distance each step of the forward search.
Item.LongDesc: 1st col = fwd search index (from init to n-1); 2nd col = minimum Mahalanobis distance.

Item.Name: Un
Item.TypeInd: Unit(s) included in the subset at each step of the search.
Item.LongDesc: REMARK: in every step the new subset is compared with the old subset. Un contains the unit(s) present in the new subset but not in the old one. Un(1,2) for example contains the unit included in step init+1. Un(end,2) contains the units included in the final step of the search.

Item.Name: varargout
Item.TypeInd: Units belonging to subset in each step of the search.
Item.LongDesc: Each row is associated to a unit while each colum is associated to a step of the fwd search.

References.Item: Atkinson Riani and Cerioli (2004), Exploring multivariate data with the forward search Springer Verlag, New York.
